name: Jet Pack Chuck
description: A Chuck Norris-inspired web game built with vanilla JS/HTML/CSS. It's a Flappy Bird-style adventure featuring custom Chuck Norris assets. After each game, enjoy Chuck Norris jokes fetched from a 3rd-party API.

name: Game Vault
description: Your one-stop destination for exploring, organizing, and discovering an expansive collection of games spanning various genres and platforms. This project is a clone of Rawg.io, aimed at enhancing my skills in React and web development.

name: Brewtiful
description: A React application showcasing my skills in front-end development. It's designed for an espresso shop, offering a user-friendly experience to explore coffee offerings and place orders with ease.

name: Ghost Upload
description: Ghost Upload, is an image uploading and link sharing platform with a strong focus on user privacy. It offers a secure and convenient way to share images and links, ensuring that your data remains confidential.

name: Country Lookup
description: Built with SvelteKit, it's your gateway to exploring random countries and uncovering intriguing details about them. With data sourced from a country API, users can discover essential information like population, currency, language, and even view the country's flag.

name: Django Paste
description: This is a pastebin type application written in Python using the Django framework. Users can paste text, choose a syntax highlighter and upload/share with various options.

name: React Track
description: As the name implies, React Track is an expense tracking application built using React. This is a very simple application that was designed to toy with state. as an alternative to TODO apps.
